Class oracle.html.TextArea 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.TextArea
public class TextArea
extends Item
Description:

TextArea class encapsulates the TEXTAREA input element in HTML2 The TextArea element represents a multi-line text field

Instructions:

Use this class to present a multi-line text field to the user for input purposes.

Example: 

// Creates a text area object with 40 columns and 10 rows
TextArea ta = new TextArea("comments", 40, 10);

See Also:
Item, TextField

Creates a TextArea Object
TextArea(String, int, int, String)
Creates a TextArea Object with default content
